dits.title: Illegal statement, extra semicolon in assignment
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 14 (tests/fail.dit)
String test; = 'cat';
             ^

SyntaxError: Illegal start of statement

dits.title: Illegal statement, double comma in list
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 30 (tests/fail.dit)
listOf String test = ['cat', ,'dog'];
                             ^

SyntaxError: Illegal start of expression

dits.title: Illegal statement, String primitive in list
dits.expected:
Line: 1 Col: 30 (tests/fail.dit)
listOf String test = ['cat', String];
                             ^

SyntaxError: Illegal start of expression

dits.title: Illegal statement, equals to new declare
dits.expected:
Line: 2 Col: 1 (tests/fail.dit)
String test2 = 'dog';
^

SyntaxError: Illegal start of expression
